Gracius' hand reaches for a button beside him as they
enter the atmosphere.

Gracius:  Prepare to transform in
5....4.....3....2...1....TRANSFORM PEACECRAFT NOW!

He presses the button and the outer layer of the ship
explodes.

--- Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote:
> 
>  chhetah" ready Gracius
>  
>   Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> Gracius: We are the Cybertronian Order of Monks.  We
> seek only peace.  We will obey whatever regulations
> your masters require of us, but this is the planet
> to
> which the Matrix has guided us.  We promise not to
> disturb history in a negative way.
> 
> Gracius waits for Cheetah to begin the
> transformation
> of the ship to a base for the landing.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...>
> wrote:
> > OOC:I know you'll land anyways, I'm just playing
> her
> > 
> > Standing on the moon, Meteara's sensors detect the
> > incoming ship. She 
> > calls them out on their own frequency.
> > 
> > Meteara: Cybertronian Ship, I am Meteara, second
> > emissary of the Vok. 
> > I must warn you that there are many other
> > Cybertronians on Vector 
> > Earth, and that your presence will unbalance its
> > stability. Therefore, 
> > I ask you not to land.
> >

> > > > and appears as if he were expecting this.
> > > >

> us
> > that may involve

> > > the
